product_name: Pacsafe Citysafe 400 GII Hobo Bag - Women's
long_description: Enhance your peace of mind when you travel-carry the CitySafe 400 GII Hobo bag from Pacsafe. This oversize shoulder bag has slashproof and anti-theft features galore. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents identity theft of your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into the fabric panels to prevent thieves from slashing through the fabric. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire inside the adjustable carry strap prevents bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at one end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture so no one can walk off with your bag. The Pacsafe CitySafe 400 GII Hobo bag has tamperproof zippers with concealed clips, making it hard for pickpockets to unzip and snatch your valuables. Bright colored liner helps you easily locate what you need; padded electronic pocket fits a 10 in. iPad(R) or tablet.
short_description: Enhance your peace of mind when you travel-carry the CitySafe 400 GII Hobo bag from Pacsafe. This oversize shoulder bag has slashproof and anti-theft features galore.
